name: Mission XZ
description:
You live in a starship flying out of any planet's gravity field. But the gravity is supported with local gravity fields. There are also magnetic fields which are used to walk on any surface (if you have magnetic boots of course). 

Weightlessness makes no difference between a floor and a ceiling so don't be surprized when you see a workplace on every wall. This is space where a lot of weird things are possible.

In this game you will solve puzzles using the properties of the space distorted with the local gravity fields, and getting into impossible places with magnetic boots.

The game is on a prototyping stage right now, and the released version is intended to be used for the first playtests. If you want to play the demo version, please take part in a short survey, I would hightly appreciate it!
